reviewText:
The children of migrants stand outside their school gate, only to be told by police
that they have no right to an education. Undeterred, they return day after day to
learn wherever they can, sneaking on to the campus, sitting in an abandoned factory,
using even the inside of a minibus. "We are the...of Communism" is inspiring,
heartbreaking, and necessary for any viewer interested in China and the marginalized.
